messages.msgSnippet: I ve done that with shows. When ever a new one starts I watch the first TWo shows before making a decision, sometimes the pilot is too explanatory and not
messages.messageBody:
I've done that with shows. When ever a new one starts I watch the first TWo
shows before making a decision, sometimes the pilot is too explanatory and
not enough jokes.
Elissa

messages.subject: Will and Grace
messages.msgSnippet: ...  Elissa, Jack!! That s it. Couldn t think of it. You know I tried watching that show twice when it first
messages.messageBody:
>From: Earthmomma67@...

<<I saw that! That was funny. His friend is Jack.>>


Elissa,

Jack!! That's it. Couldn't think of it. You know I tried watching that show
twice when it first came on and just didn't find it funny. I kept hearing so
much about it and couldn't understand. Then just like a month ago I watched
again and thought it was just too funny. I guess it was just me or maybe it
got a lot better. Anyway, now I really enjoy it when I see it.

Mary B
